类 MathTeacher

  • java.lang.Object
    • MathTeacher

  • public class MathTeacher
extends java.lang.Object
    Title: MathTeacher Description: MathTeacher is a basic math teacher program used by young children to practice simple arithmetic.
    作者:
    Siyue Chen

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类 说明
      private class  MathTeacher.ButtonListener
      ButtonListener implements ActionListener set different functions to buttons
      class  MathTeacher.NumberLimitedDmt
      NumberLimitedDmt extends PlainDocument set limit so that only numbers and minus can be input.

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器 说明
      MathTeacher​()

      所有方法 静态方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法 说明
      private void checkAns​()
      checkAns() method check whether the input equals to result
      static boolean isNumeric​(java.lang.String s)
      isNumeric(String s) method verifies whether the passing String is numeric
      static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
      main() method that launches the application
      private void printCorrect​()
      printCorrect() method print the correct answer to previous answer
      private void printScore​()
      printScore() method print the record of the score
      private void questionGenerate​()
      questionGenerate() method generate a random arithmetic question The arguments are integers in the range 1 to 10 The arithmetic operations allowed are +, -, x, /

      • main

        public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
        main() method that launches the application
        参数:
        args - No args input

      • questionGenerate

        private void questionGenerate​()
        questionGenerate() method generate a random arithmetic question The arguments are integers in the range 1 to 10 The arithmetic operations allowed are +, -, x, /

      • isNumeric

        public static final boolean isNumeric​(java.lang.String s)
        isNumeric(String s) method verifies whether the passing String is numeric
        参数:
        s - String the input string
        返回:
        Return TRUE if it is numeric
